name: Philosophy
descriptions: The Philosophy minor develops rigorous analytical reasoning, ethical thinking, and argumentation skills. Students take courses across three areas: historical studies, logical studies, and topical studies.
At least 9 of the 18 hours must be at the 30000 level or higher, including at least 3 hours of topical studies at the 40000 level.

courses: 3+ hours in topical studies at the 40000 level

electiveCourses.description: 9 additional hours of philosophy courses. At least 9 total hours must be at the 30000 level or higher.
